title: Technology Integration Education Assessment Design Based on the SQD Model

context.prior_knowledge: Basic social studies subject knowledge and experience with digital device usage
context.additional_context: Simulation/VR-based assessment design evaluating social studies technology integration in smartphone-centric limited-technology environments

learning_goals: Learners can design social studies and technology-integrated lessons utilizing the five key elements of the SQD model (Reflection, Role Model, Collaboration, Instructional Design, Authentic Experiences).
Learners can measure technology integration performance using a 5-point Likert scale-based self-assessment tool in a VR simulation environment.
Learners can compile collaboration task results into a portfolio and develop improvement plans incorporating peer evaluations and instructor feedback.

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
